description.value:
Effect: You gain a bonus equal to the caster cleric level on a single Charisma-based skill check or Charisma ability check.

Duration: One hour or until the creature elects to apply the bonus to a roll.

Usage: Set this buff's level equal to the caster level of touch of glory.

Current value: [[@item.level]]

contextNotes.text: +[[@item.level]] to a single charisma based skill check. The receiver of the buff must elect to use the buff before the roll..
+[[@item.level]] to a single charisma ability check. The receiver of the buff must elect to use the buff before the roll.
